solution_line_template: I calculate consumption between November 1, 2005 and January 1, 2006: {initial_volume_nov_1} - {remaining_volume_jan_1} = <<{initial_volume_nov_1}-{remaining_volume_jan_1}={consumption_nov_jan}>>{consumption_nov_jan} L

I calculate consumption between January 1, 2006 and May 1, 2006: {volume_after_refill_jan_1} - {remaining_volume_may_1} = <<{volume_after_refill_jan_1}-{remaining_volume_may_1}={consumption_jan_may}>>{consumption_jan_may} L

I calculate the total consumption between November 1st and May 1st: {consumption_nov_jan} + {consumption_jan_may} = <<{consumption_nov_jan}+{consumption_jan_may}={total_consumption}>>{total_consumption} L
